text: Edward Allan Clarke (5 October 1950 – 10 January 2018), better known as "Fast" Eddie Clarke, was a British guitarist. He was a member of heavy metal bands Fastway and Motörhead. Of Motörhead's classic lineup, which was made up of Lemmy, himself and Phil "Philthy Animal" Taylor, he was the last surviving member. He was born in London. Clarke died of pneumonia on 10 January 2018 in London, at the age of 67. ==References== ==Other websites== *The official on- line tribute to Fast Eddie Clarke * *Interview with online fanzine *– 6ftplus blog interview with Eddie Clarke *Fast Eddie Clarke, Interview: "Back In The Saddle" October, 2011 *Motörhead official website * * Category:1950 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Disease-related deaths in London Category:Heavy metal guitarists Category:English rock guitarists Category:Musicians from London
title: Eddie Clarke
